ext_description.p: A Pre_defined_parallel_datum_axis_2d_symbol is a type of and a type of . A Pre_defined_parallel_datum_axis_2d_symbol is a standard representation for a in a 2 dimensional coordinate system. The axis represented shall be parallel to, or congruent with, the plane that represents the 2 dimensional coordinate system in an associated 3 dimensional coordinate system.

ext_descriptions.ext_description: the associated_element specifies the role of the for the Pre_defined_parallel_datum_axis_2d_symbol.

ext_description.p: A Pre_defined_perpendicular_datum_axis_2d_symbol is a type of and a type of . A Pre_defined_perpendicular_datum_axis_2d_symbol is a standard representation for a that is parallel to the normal of the plane that represents the 2 dimensional coordinated system in an associated 3 dimensional coordinate system.

ext_descriptions.ext_description: the associated_element specifies the role of the for the Pre_defined_perpendicular_datum_axis_2d_symbol.

ext_description.note: The text description for this Application Object has not been fully updated to agree with the EXPRESS.
ext_description.p: A Pre_defined_perpendicular_datum_plane_2d_symbol is a type of and a type of . A Pre_defined_perpendicular_plane_2d_symbol is a standard representation for a that is perpendicular to the plane that represents the 2 dimensional coordinate system in an associated 3 dimensional coordinate system.

ext_descriptions.ext_description: the associated_element specifies the role of the for the Pre_defined_perpendicular_datum_plane_2d_symbol.
